android.car.oem

类 OemCarService

  • java.lang.Object
    • Service
      • android.car.oem.OemCarService

  • public abstract class OemCarService
extends Service
    This code will be running as part of the OEM Service. This provides basic implementation for OEM Service. OEMs should extend this class and override relevant methods.

    OEM service implementation should have android.car.permission.BIND_OEM_CAR_SERVICE as required permission in manifest to connect to the OEM service.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • OemCarService

        public OemCarService()

    • 方法详细资料

      • onCreate

        public void onCreate()

        OEM should override this method and do the initialization. OEM should also call super after initialization as this method would call OemCarServiceComponent.init() for each component implemented by OEM.

        Car Service will not be available at the time of this initialization. If the OEM needs anything from CarService, they should wait for the CarServiceReady() call. It is expected that most of the initialization will finish in this call.

      • onDestroy

        public void onDestroy()

        OEM should override this method and do all the resources deallocation. OEM should also call super after resource deallocation as this method would call OemCarServiceComponent.release() for each component implemented by OEM.

      • onStartCommand

        public final int onStartCommand(Intent intent,
                                int flags,
                                int startId)

      • onBind

        public final IBinder onBind(Intent intent)

      • getOemAudioFocusService

        public OemCarAudioFocusService getOemAudioFocusService()
        Gets Audio Focus Service implemented by OEM Service.
        返回:
        audio focus service if implemented by OEM service, else return null.

      • getOemAudioVolumeService

        public OemCarAudioVolumeService getOemAudioVolumeService()
        Gets Audio Volume implemented by OEM Service.
        返回:
        audio volume service if implemented by OEM service, else return null.

      • getOemAudioDuckingService

        public OemCarAudioDuckingService getOemAudioDuckingService()
        Gets Audio Ducking implemented by OEM Service.
        返回:
        audio ducking service if implemented by OEM service, else return null.

      • dump

        public void dump(java.io.FileDescriptor fd,
                 java.io.PrintWriter writer,
                 java.lang.String[] args)

      • getSupportedCarVersion

        public abstract CarVersion getSupportedCarVersion()
        Checks the supported CarVersion by the OEM service.

      • onCarServiceReady

        public abstract void onCarServiceReady()
        Informs OEM service that CarService is now ready for communication.

        OEM should override this method if there is any initialization depending on CarService.
